jobs.job_description:
Are you seeking a development team that can elevate your web application to new heights? Look no further! Our team of seasoned developers brings a wealth of experience and expertise to the table, and we're here to deliver exceptional React.js with TypeScript solutions that will take your project to the next level.

What sets us apart:

Mastery of React.js: Our developers are well-versed in React.js, a leading JavaScript library for building dynamic user interfaces. With our deep understanding of React's component-based architecture, state management, and virtual DOM, we create web applications that are lightning-fast and highly responsive.

TypeScript Prowess: TypeScript is a game-changer when it comes to enhancing code quality and maintainability. Our team excels in using TypeScript to add static typing and type inference to your React applications. This means fewer runtime errors, improved code documentation, and a more robust codebase.

Optimized Performance: We're committed to delivering web applications that not only look fantastic but also perform seamlessly. With React.js and TypeScript, we create applications that load quickly, handle complex data with ease, and provide a smooth user experience.

Scalability: Whether you're building a small project or a large-scale application, our React.js with TypeScript solutions are designed with scalability in mind. We ensure that your application can grow and adapt to your evolving needs.

Clean and Maintainable Code: With TypeScript, we create code that is self-documenting and easy to maintain. This means that your project will remain efficient and adaptable over time.

Responsive Design: Our developers understand the importance of responsive web design, and we make sure that your application looks and works great on all devices, from mobile phones to desktops.

Testing and Quality Assurance: We implement thorough testing processes to ensure that your application is reliable and free of bugs. TypeScript helps catch potential issues before they become problems.

Real-time Communication: If your project requires real-time features like chat or live updates, we're well-versed in integrating technologies like WebSockets to provide seamless, instant communication.

User-Centric Approach: Your end-users are at the forefront of our development process. We consider user experience, accessibility, and design to create applications that users love.

Effective Collaboration: We believe in clear and open communication with our clients. We work closely with you to understand your goals, provide regular updates, and ensure that your vision is realized.

If you're ready to harness the power of React.js and TypeScript for your web development project, contact us today. Our team is dedicated to delivering outstanding results that will exceed your expectations. Let's turn your vision into a reality with our exceptional React.js with TypeScript development services.

Qualifications: Effective Collaboration: We believe in clear and open communication with our clients

jobs.job_description:
Position Summary:

As a frontend engineer, your responsibilities will revolve around designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality web applications using React.js. You will collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into scalable and responsive user interfaces. Your role will involve writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and coding standards. You will be responsible for implementing front-end functionalities, integrating APIs, and ensuring optimal performance and user experience. Additionally, you will participate in code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting, as well as contribute to the continuous improvement of the development process by staying updated with the latest technologies and suggesting innovative solutions to enhance the company's software offerings. Your strong expertise in React.js, proficiency in JavaScript, and ability to work in an agile environment will be crucial in delivering cutting-edge web applications that meet the specific needs of the insurance industry.

Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers, to build and enhance the frontend of web applications. Use modern frontend technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (we use React) to create intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
• Contribute to the architectural design and technical decisions of the frontend components, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and performance. Collaborate with the team to establish coding standards, best practices, and design patterns to deliver high-quality and efficient code.
• Take ownership of assigned features or user stories and implement them end-to-end. Write clean and modular code, implement business logic, integrate with APIs, and ensure the seamless integration of frontend components with the backend systems.
• Participate in code reviews to provide constructive feedback and ensure code quality, adherence to coding standards, and optimization opportunities. Perform thorough testing and debugging to identify and fix bugs, ensuring the stability and reliability of the web application.
• Actively collaborate with the team, participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings. Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and project managers to discuss requirements, provide progress updates, and address any technical challenges.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend technologies, frameworks, and best practices. Conduct research, experiment with new tools, and share knowledge with the team, contributing to continuous improvement and innovation within the frontend development process.

Qualifications:
• 5-7 years of experience using ReactJS in production.
• Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English.
• Curiosity and attitude: we are looking for self-starters who are not only individual contributor but aspire to elevate the rest of their team.
• Problem solver and solutions oriented. Experience working at a fintech startup is a plus.
• Nice-to-have: experience with databases (we use Postgres and MongoDB)
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.

Summary

Software Technology Group is a software development consulting company dedicated to building software solutions that transform our clients businesses. Unlike most consulting companies, we have full-time salaried positions and offer our employees the chance to build and strengthen their skills with our custom Career Developing Plans, Certifications, Mentorships, and training. Our main goal is to help you have the career you want while also building the skill set you desire - sounds pretty awesome right?

We’re currently looking for React Developers to join our team. If you’re ready for the job of a lifetime, and ready to see how STG can develop your career, your skills and your life, apply today. We can’t wait to hear from you!

_________________________________

Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and implement responsive web applications using React and its related libraries and tools.
• Collaborate with product owners, UX/UI designers, and back-end developers to gather requirements and translate them into functional user interfaces.
• Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to industry best practices and coding standards.
• Develop reusable components and libraries for future use.
• Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
• Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the delivery of high-quality software.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in React and front-end development, and propose their adoption when appropriate.
• Collaborate with the back-end development team to integrate front-end components with server-side logic.
• Work closely with UX/UI designers to ensure the best user experience and visual aesthetics.
• Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement.
• Contribute to continuous improvement initiatives related to development processes and methodologies.

Requirements:

• Strong proficiency in React and its related libraries (React Router, Redux, etc.).

• Familiarity with front-end build tools and package managers (Webpack, Babel, npm, yarn).
• Understanding of version control systems, such as Git.
• Knowledge of RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
• Excellent attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality software.
• Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and effectively communicate with cross-functional teams.
• Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus.
• Experience with TypeScript is a plus.
• Knowledge of other front-end frameworks (Angular, Vue.js) is a plus.
• Familiarity with back-end development using Node.js or other server-side technologies is a plus.

Our unique consulting company has been changing lives since 1996, providing full-time employment with benefits and paid time off. Plus, our Dev. We value our employees and offer generous benefits and regular bonuses. Join our awesome team at STG, where you'll feel valued and truly make a difference.

There are so many more reasons why STG is an incredible place to work, check out the scoop here: https://stgconsulting.com/careers/

Overview:

We're looking for an experienced React Developer to design and implement more features within our web app (pickaxeproject.com). Currently we allow users to build their own AI-powered forms/chatbots and embed them onto their website. We've already done the work of integrating with OpenAI and building out the i-frame integration. Now we want to build out two more ways for an end-user to access these i-frames: A floating action button that opens into a pop-up chatbot and an in-line button that opens a pop-up chatbot.

This role involves not only developing the new component but also integrating it with our existing architecture. The successful candidate will have the opportunity for extended collaboration on a variety of projects in the future.

-Develop standalone React components that align with our web app’s existing design and functionality

-Work with our design team to implement user-friendly editing tools to refine the generated prompts

-Test the component for performance, usability, and compatibility

-Address feedback from our team and make necessary modifications

Qualifications:

-Proficiency in React and familiarity with Next.js.

-Ability to parse and integrate with pre-existing React components

-Familiarity with Python and Flask is a plus

-Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

-Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal

How to stand out:

-Provide portfolio/examples of React components or projects you've previously worked on.

-Be enthusiastic about the possibilities of generative AI

-Be located in the Los Angeles area

-Please keep communications within upwork

jobs.job_description:
The Developer’s primary responsibilities are to analyze, design, implement and test customized software applications. The Developer will have a strong knowledge of software development and design and will have experience working to develop business-critical applications.

Job Description

Designs, develops, and maintains complex applications

Develops unit tests and provides code coverage to accurately test business logic and functionality

Participates in developing specifications such as user stories and designs

Solves or recommends solutions for complex issues and problems

Assist in the development of logical and physical specifications

Documents designs, issues, solutions, tips & tricks as needed

Fosters a team approach to software development and delivery

Ensure website responsiveness.

Work with design team to develop visual components

Work on site reliability, quality, define SLA, SLO, SLI and able to monitor and meet the application KPIs

Stays current in new IT technologies to maintain a high level of subject matter expertise.

Minimum Qualifications:

Architecture and design of the web application and supporting components.

Understanding of code security and data protection.

Experience with either of backend technologies like Java, PHP, Go lang, etc.

Proficient experience using with any of these languages ReactJS, Redux, React Native, VueJS, NodeJs

Experience with writing unit test cases for both back end and front-end stacks

Understanding of mobile first approach in development

Experience with cloud message APIs and usage of push notifications.

Knowledge of code versioning tools such as git, svn, etc.

Experience with working in a CI/CD environment

Knowledge of agile methodologies like Scrum, SAFe

HS Diploma or GED from accredited institution

Preferred Qualifications:

Healthcare Experience
